title: Mayura Kundan Haaram: Exquisite Peacock Pendant Necklace
features: This magnificent Haaram showcases a central peacock (Mayura) pendant, meticulously handcrafted with the finest Kundan stones, a traditional Rajasthani setting technique popular in Hyderabadi jewelry. The pendant features an intricate layered design. The necklace strand is composed of alternating Ruby and Emerald beads, adding vibrancy and elegance. Intricate gold filigree work enhances the beauty of the pendant.
description: Timeless elegance with a contemporary twist. The Mayura Kundan Haaram is a symbol of beauty and grace, making it a treasured heirloom. The combination of Kundan work with natural gemstones and the Hyderabadi polish gives it a rich, regal look. The classic peacock design holds deep cultural significance and is believed to bring good fortune. The high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting shine.
